<font face="Segoe UI, Verdana, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif">
=== How To Download ===
 If you want to develop *panzer* project, you can use [http://ankhsvn.open.collab.net/ AnkhSvn] download code, you can view [http://blog.sina.com.cn/s/blog_604c436d0100o04n.html Using AnkhSvn, Visual Studio 2008 2010 To Share Your Code], open the solution file zsharedcode.sln in the zsharedcode directory http://zsharedcode.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ by [http://ankhsvn.open.collab.net/ AnkhSvn].

 If you only need to use the feature of *panzer*, please download zip compressed package at [Download Downloads]. We have released the dll of JQueryElement and IEBrowser.

=== Configure The Environment ===
 If you want to develop *panzer* project, it is recommended that use Visual Studio 2010, .NET 4 or higher, if you open zsharedcode.sln using Visual Studio 2008 or earlier versions, may cause some problems in the project.

 If you use only dll files of *panzer*, you only need to reference a version of the dll files, they can be used for Visual Studio 2010 and its previous version.
